alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Dooly; Houston; Macon; Sumter (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 12:22AM EDT until August 10 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL MACON...DOOLY...SOUTHWESTERN HOUSTON...NORTHEASTERN SUMTER AND NORTHWESTERN CRISP COUNTIES... At 1221 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Flint River Wma, or 9 miles southeast of Oglethorpe, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Vienna, Oglethorpe, Unadilla, Montezuma, Marshallville, Byromville, Pinehurst, Andersonville, Lilly, Dooling, Whitewater State Park, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Richwood, Flint River Wma, Elko, Pennington, Andersonville National Historic, Drayton, and Clearview. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
